trans-unit.source: Exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*> method, which allows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> data to be custom filtered.
trans-unit.target: Expõe as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*>método, o que lhe permite <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> filtrado de dados personalizada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*>

trans-unit.source: The IDataPointFilter interface exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method, which takes a specific data point within a series and returns a `Boolean` value that determines whether that data point will be filtered.
trans-unit.target: A interface IDataPointFilter expõe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>método, o que utiliza um ponto de dados específicas dentro de uma série e devolve um `Boolean` valor que determina se será filtrado desse ponto de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform custom filtering: - Derive a new or existing class from this interface.
trans-unit.target: Para efetuar a filtragem personalizadas:-deriva de uma classe de nova ou existente desta interface.

trans-unit.source: - Override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method to provide the custom filtering logic.
trans-unit.target: -Substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>método para fornecer a lógica de filtragem personalizada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To initiate the filtering operation, call one of the `Filter` methods in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator> class that takes an IDataPointFilter object as its first parameter.
trans-unit.target: -Para iniciar a operação de filtragem, chamar um do `Filter` métodos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>classe pega num objeto IDataPointFilter como primeiro parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>

trans-unit.source: For sample source code, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para o código de origem de exemplo, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a particular data point in the series will be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um ponto de dados específica da série será filtrado.

trans-unit.source: This method should be called for each data point in a series, and returns a `Boolean` value indicating whether a data point should be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Este método deve ser chamado para cada ponto de dados de uma série e devolve um `Boolean` valor que indica se um ponto de dados deve ser filtrado.

trans-unit.source: To provide custom filtering, derive a new or existing class from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> interface and then implement this method.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecer a filtragem personalizada, uma classe nova ou existente a partir de derivar de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>interface e, em seguida, implemente este método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>

trans-unit.source: Provide custom criteria matching logic, then return `true` or `false` to mark the data points to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Fornecer a lógica de correspondência de critérios personalizados, em seguida, devolver `true` ou `false` para marcar os pontos de dados a filtrar.

trans-unit.source: After this method has been implemented, use one of the `Filter` method definitions in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator> class that takes an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> object as a parameter to perform the filtering.
trans-unit.target: Depois deste método foi implementado, utilize um do `Filter` definições de método no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>classe que assume um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>objecto como um parâmetro para efetuar a filtragem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>

trans-unit.source: Filtered points, by default, are removed from a series.
trans-unit.target: Pontos de filtradas, por predefinição, são removidos de uma série.

trans-unit.source: They can also be displayed as empty points by setting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Também pode ser apresentados como pontos vazios definindo o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: Filtered points can also be marked as filtered if they do not match filtering criteria, as determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>value.
trans-unit.target: Pontos filtrados também podem ser marcados como filtrado se estes não correspondem aos critérios de filtragem, conforme determinado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> object that the data point belongs to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> objeto que pertence o ponto de dados.

trans-unit.source: The index of the data point, which determines its position in the series.
trans-unit.target: O índice do ponto de dados, que determina a posição da série.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the data point is removed, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Se o ponto de dados for removido, caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
